article.title: San Diego & Imperial District Export Council
article.summary: Learn more about the San Diego and Imperial District Export Council.
article.content:
CouncilRoster as of 7/17/14

Executive Committee

Chair: Bo Reed—Solar Turbines, Inc.

Vice Chair: Aron Davidson—Booz Allen Hamilton

Treasurer: David Schultz—Quantum Design, Inc.

Executive Secretary: Matt Andersen—U.S. Department of Commerce

Previous Chair: Thomas Topuzes—Thomas Topuzes & Associates LLC

National DEC Steering Committee: Mark Ballam—SDSU CIBER

General Membership

Karla Aki—FedEx

Glenn Barroga—Philippines Trade

Mike Bronner—Dr. Bronner's Magic Soaps

Bob Cange—Cange International, Inc.

Victor Castillo—Southwestern College CITD

Hugh Constant—International Issues

Brennon Crist—Chase Bank, JP Morgan Chase

Tim DeMarco—International Decisions Inc.; ex.SDIDEC Chair

John Dunlop—InterNetLC.com, LLC

Luis Eternod—Pacific Aviation; ex-SDIDEC Chair

Mike Faulkner—Nimbus Water International

Richard Forsyth—Westbridge Agricultural Products; ex-SDIDEC Chair

Wendy Gillespie—Frontier Trading, Inc.

Patricia Hall—Trade & Shipping Logistics Professional

Tim Kelley—Imperial Valley EDC

Arturo Lopez—Smith Micro Software

Dr. Christina Luhn—San Diego Regional EDC (Cali-Baja Mega Region)

Kenn Morris—CrossBorder Business Associates

Michael Pearlman—InterOcean Systems; ex-SDIDEC Chair

Bill Plourd—El Toro Export LLC

Monique Rodriguez—Qualcomm Inc.

Dr. Camille Schuster—Cal State San Marcos

Michael Slater—Business Consultant (Formerly NIK Software, purchased by Google)

Cassie Stiles—Export Finance Professional; ex-SDIDEC Chair

Paul Thomas—Julian Hard Cider

Joel Valenzuela—Port of San Diego

Jim Van Eenenaam—General Atomics

Allen Vigil—Grupo Logistics

DEC Alumni & Friends

Jeff Broido—Former SDIDEC Chair & Treasurer

Eric Eng—International Accountant; Hong Kong Association of S.CA

Dr. Greg Gazda—University of San Diego; Professor Emeritus

Sally Johnson—Trade Team Global, Internet LC.com

Robert Plotkin—Celsius Group

John Roberts— Water Technology Professional​
